dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5643 IH: Streamlining Nutrition Paperwork Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Kuster (for herself and Mr. McGovern) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to permit States to record in writing that applicants for supplemental nutrition assistance benefits have signed an application through a recorded verbal assent over the telephone.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Streamlining Nutrition Paperwork Act of 2023 or the SNP Act of 2023.
Section 11(e)(2)(C) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2020(e)(2)(C)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the heading, by inserting or video, after telephonic, and
by inserting or by gesture over a video phone for hearing impaired applicants before the period at the end, and

paragraph.text: in clause (iii)(I) by inserting as audio or in writing after record.

subsection.text: This Act, and the amendments made by this Act, shall take effect on January 1, 2024.
The amendments made by section 2 shall apply with respect to applications made after the effective date of this Act.
